TEXT.TITLE: FHLBB CHANGES SHORT-TERM DISCOUNT NOTE RATES
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Home Loan Bank Board adjusted the rates on its short-term discount notes as follows: MATURITY NEW RATE OLD RATE MATURITY 5.00 pct 30-69 days 5.92 pct 70-88 days 30-123 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 89-123 days 124-150 days 5.93 pct 5.93 pct 124-150 days 151-349 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 151-349 days 350-360 days 5.98 pct 5.98 pct 350-360 days Reuter
